nodes.text: Patriot Hall was a large hallway at the entrance of Calimondretta, the capital city of the Arkadianate which was situated on the icy planet of Syned. Its entrance was guarded by a large magnetic barrier which was administrated by Calimondretta Control, which was responsible for controlling the entry and exit of vehicles into the city. During the Siege of Calimondretta, much of the hall was damaged during an attack by Jarrow Rusher's mercenary group Rusher's Brigade which infiltrated the city using a hijacked icecrawler known as Crawler One.
